SoundPool.Builder().Description: Constructs a new Builder with the defaults format values. If not provided, the maximum number of streams is 1 (see @B_android#media#SoundPool#Builder#setMaxStreams_E@ to change it), and the audio attributes have a usage value of @B_android#media#AudioAttributes#USAGE_MEDIA_E@ (see @B_android#media#SoundPool#Builder#setAudioAttributes_E@ to change them).

Parameters: int: a value equal to 1 or greater.
setMaxStreams(int).Description: Sets the maximum of number of simultaneous streams that can be played simultaneously.

setAudioAttributes(android.media.AudioAt.Description: Sets the @B_android#media#AudioAttributes_E@. For examples, game applications will use attributes built with usage information set to @B_android#media#AudioAttributes#USAGE_GAME_E@.
